discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
Correct is A and C

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/jabber/Windows/9_7/CJAB_BK_C606D8A9_00_cisco-jabber-dns-configuration-guide/CJAB_BK_C606D8A9_00_cisco-jabber-dns-configuration-guide_chapter_010.html

choices.B: username portion of the login email
choices.C: domain portion of the login email

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A collaboration engineer is configuring Jabber for Windows in softphone mode inside the corporate firewall. The engineer initially tests the client by manually setting the account type and the login server domain name. Everything works as expected. Next, the engineer resets Jabber and attempts to log in using automatic settings and receives an error. Which two items must be modified to resolve the issue? (Choose two.)
Which operating system is supported for smart card-based authentication on Jabber and Cisco UCM platforms?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/jabber/10_5/CJAB_BK_D6497E98_00_deployment-installation-guide-ciscojabber/CJAB_BK_D6497E98_00_deployment-installation-guide-ciscojabber_chapter_0100.html

The IdP requests credentials. Credentials can be supplied in one of the following methods:

 Form-based authentication that contains username and password fields.
 Kerberos for Integrated Windows Authentication (IWA) (Windows only)
 Smart card authentication (Windows only)

choices.B: HTTPS networking uses a ring topology.
choices.A: HTTPS single-site networks are joined via an intersite link.
choices.D: HTTPS networking uses the SMTP protocol.
choices.E: HTTPS networking supports a maximum of 25 locations.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AE
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/connection/14/design/guide/b_14cucdg/b_14cucdg_chapter_010011.html

From the document:
HTTPS is used in Intersite networking when linking two separate sites. 
The maximum number of Unity Connection locations that you can connect in an HTTPS network is 25
The legacy and HTTPS networking are not supported simultaneously in the same network. In legacy networking, SMTP is the method used within a site

Imho should be A and E, I canÂ´t find any infos about HTTP using SMTP....

Here the reason:

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/connection/14/design/guide/b_14cucdg/b_14cucdg_chapter_010011.html

You can use an intersite link to connect one Unity Connection site to another Unity Connection site, allowing you to scale your organization from a maximum of ten locations to a maximum of twenty.

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/connection/11x/https_networking/guide/b_11xcuchttpsnet.pdf

HTTPS networking supports single site networks only. You cannot connect multiple HTTPS networks or single site networks together to form a larger network. The maximum number of Unity Connection locations that you can connect in an HTTPS network is 25.

Selected Answer: DE
D and E

HTTPS networking supports single site networks only. You cannot connect multiple HTTPS networks or
single site networks together to form a larger network. The maximum number of Unity Connection locations
that you can connect in an HTTPS network is 25.

Selected Answer: DE
Should be D and E

comments.content: Sorry, should be D and E.

discussion.content: HTTPS networking supports single site networks only. You cannot connect multiple HTTPS networks or single site networks together to form a larger network. The maximum number of Unity Connection locations that you can connect in an HTTPS network is 25. according to this, I think the option A and E are correct

Selected Answer: AD
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/connection/11x/https_networking/guide/b_11xcuchttpsnet/b_11xcuchttpsnet_chapter_010.html

Linking Unity Connection Servers with HTTPS Link

To create an HTTPS network of Unity Connection servers, you start by linking two servers together via an HTTPS link. At a single point of time, a particular location can be joined with only one location in the network. 

SMTP is used to transmit messages between Unity Connection locations in a network

questions.question_text: What are two characteristics of HTTPS networking for Cisco Unity Connection? (Choose two.)
What is the maximum number of Cisco Unity Connection locations connected in a HTTPS network?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
the asnwer is 25

B - HTTPS networking supports single site networks only. You cannot connect multiple HTTPS networks or single site networks together to form a larger network. The maximum number of Unity Connection locations that you can connect in an HTTPS network is 25.

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/connection/10x/https_networking/guide/10xcuchttpsnetx/10xcuchttpsnet010.html

questions.question_text: An engineer needs to configure calendar integration between Microsoft Exchange and a Cisco IM and Presence server. The engineer created the resource mailboxes and now needs to add impersonation. Which command accomplishes this task using the Exchange Management Shell from Microsoft Exchange?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
As Eamy91 states, D is correct, and here is the Cisco Documentation as well:
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/cucm/im_presence/exchange_integration/10_5_1/CUP0_BK_IBB369E9_00_imp-exchange-integration-guide-105/CUP0_BK_IBB369E9_00_imp-exchange-integration-guide-105_chapter_011.html#CUP0_TK_G52196E4_00
